Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Blade of Leaping Gold
Artefact.Description: The blade confers +3 Attacks on the character wielding it.

Artefact.Name: Bow of the Seafarer
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Resolve each hit like a single bolt from a Bolt Thrower
Artefact.Description: Resolve each hit like a single bolt from a Bolt Thrower.

Artefact.Name: Sword of Hoeth
Artefact.Description: All hits wound automatically.

Artefact.Name: Star Lance
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Lance. The bearer receives +3 Strength on the turn he charges
Artefact.Description: Lance. The bearer receives +3 Strength on the turn he charges.

Artefact.Name: Reaver bow
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Longbow with Strength 5, multiple shot x3
Artefact.Description: Treat the Reaver Bow as a normal longbow with the following exceptions: the bearer may shoot three times at the same target in each ot his Shooting phases and any hits are resolved at Strength 5.

Artefact.Name: The White Sword
Artefact.Description: Model on foot only, requires two hands. The bearer adds +2 to his Strength when using the White Sword. In addition it confers the Killing Blow special rule.

Artefact.Name: Blade of Sea Gold
Artefact.Description: No armour saves may be taken against wounds caused by the Blade of Sea Gold.

Artefact.Name: Foe Bane
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All hits on a target with 2 or more Wounds on its starting profile will always wound on a 2+
Artefact.Description: All hits on a target with 2 or more Wounds on its starting profile will always wound on a 2+.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Protection
Artefact.Description: Counts as light armour (armour save 6+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. It also provides a 4+ Ward save.

Artefact.Name: Golden Shield
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All successful attempts to hit the bearer in close combat must be re-rolled
Artefact.Description: This shield confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, all successful attempts to hit the bearer in close combat must be re-rolled.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Stars
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: After any unsaved wound model is instantly teleported 3D6" in a random direction
Artefact.Description: May only be worn by a model on foot. The Armour of Stars counts as light armour (armour save 6 + ) which can be combined with other equipment normally. If the wearer suffers an unsaved wound he is instantly teleported 3D6" in a random direction.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Heroes
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Opponent must first pass a Leadership test before can attack
Artefact.Description: Counts as heavy armour (armour save 5+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. In order to allocate close combat attacks against the wearer, an opponent must first pass a Leadership test. Test each Close Combat phase. If the test is failed, the enemy may not attack.

Artefact.Name: Temakador's Gauntlets
Artefact.Description: These gauntlets grant a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. They also give the bearer a 5+ Ward save against attacks of Strength 4 or greater.

Artefact.Name: Shadow Armour
Artefact.Description: Counts as heavy armour (armour save 5+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, if the wearer is an independent character on foot then he has the Scout special rule. He may choose to deploy either at the same rime as the other characters, or as a Scout (including setting up with a unit of Shadow Warriors).

Artefact.Name: Armour of Caledor
Artefact.Description: Confers a 2+ armour save, that cannot be improved by any means. In addition, the Armour of Caledor follows the normal rules for Dragon armour.

Artefact.Name: Helm of Fortune
Artefact.Description: This helm confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. The wearer may re-roll failed armour saves.

Artefact.Name: Dragonscale Shield
Artefact.Description: This shield confers a 5+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also gives the bearer a 6+ Ward save.

Artefact.Name: Mask of the Merlord
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Can move over marsh, rivers, lakes or any other water features without penalty, and will benefit from soft cover while in such terrain
Artefact.Description: Model on foot only. This mask confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, the wearer can move over marsh, rivers, lakes or any other water features without penalty, and will benefit from soft cover while in such terrain.
